data.message: Facebook I sent you a message a week ago and received no reply?

replies.message: Hi Kathleen. This is a great place to ask questions. Let us know how we can help! -Hannah

Hi - someone set up a site on Facebook - are they entitled to charge you?  Someone set up a site where you can sell and buy things and is now charging for using the site only i you want to sell something but to browse the site and buy things its free.  There are plenty of free sites to join but just wondering if people have the right to charge you?
